name: brawny
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
physically strong and with big muscles: He was a big brawny man with huge hands. At twelve years of age, he was already big and brawny.
Thesaurus: synonyms, antonyms, and examples
having a lot of physical or mental strengthstrongHe is a big, strong man.strongTwo thirds of voters see him as a strong leader.powerfulHe is the most powerful fighter I have seen in a boxing ring.muscularHe is tall with a muscular body.muscledShe has worked hard to achieve that muscled body.

More examplesFewer examplesHer husband is a great brawny figure of a man.A brawny Scotsman wearing a kilt entered the room.His brawny arms glistened with sweat.
